viable_vendors.name: Trino
viable_vendors.description: Open-source distributed SQL query engine for federated analytics across heterogeneous data sources (S3, databases, APIs). Formerly PrestoSQL.

viable_vendors.name: Starburst Enterprise
viable_vendors.description: Enterprise Trino distribution with advanced security, performance optimizations, and support.
